txt.en:
'It looks like the Angmarim have been using this dock to ferry troops around the lake. See the boats down at the end?

'Being able to quickly shift their forces like that has presented a problem for us. We cannot react fast enough, and they can flank us with ease.

'Let us set these boats ablaze and hamper their ability to do that.'
'Very good. Now that they do not have boats to use, I wonder if they will try to swim to get to us....'
The Angmarim are using boats to transport their troops around the ruins and Evendim.
Orchalwë wants you to burn the boats at the dock.
Orchalwë will want to know the boats have been burned.
